Searching for factors to consider when choosing a telescope for stargazing.
To choose a telescope for stargazing, consider factors like aperture size, portability, and budget. A good beginner telescope is a 6-inch Dobsonian.

What is the best time of year to stargaze?
Plan: 1) Search for the best time of year to stargaze. 2) Return the answer.
Searching for the best time of year to stargaze.
The best time of year to stargaze is during the winter months when the skies are clearer and nights are longer.
